revised_title: Mixed Crystal Formation and Phase Transitions in Bromnitrobenzene and Chlornitrobenzene Mixtures
tldr: The authors studied the crystallization and melting/freezing point curves of mixtures of p-bromnitrobenzene and p-chlornitrobenzene, which form mixed crystals. They discovered that the mixtures exhibit a transition point in their freezing point curve, indicating a change in the nature of the crystals. The authors also found two different types of mixed crystals with distinct melting points, which they labeled as types 'a' and 'ft'.
